required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy of Tegoprazan Based Bismuth Quadruple Therapy for Helicobacter Pylori Infection
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy of Tegoprazan Based Bismuth Quadruple Therapy Compared With Bismuth Quadruple Therapy for Helicobacter Pylori Infection: Randomized, Double-blind, Active-Controlled Study

brief_summary.textblock: This study aims to investigate eradication rate, drug compliance, and adverse events in patients with confirmed Helicobacter pylori infection between tegoprazan, bismuth, metronidazole, and tetracycline for 14 days (TBMT) and PPI, bismuth, metronidazole, and tetracycline for 14 days (LBMT)

detailed_description.textblock: This is a multi-center, double-blind, randomized, active-controlled study.

primary_outcome.measure: H. pylori eradication rate of each group
primary_outcome.time_frame: UBT test 4 weeks after completion of eradication treatment
primary_outcome.description: H. pylori eradication rate of each group

arm_group.arm_group_label: tegoprazan based bismuth quadruple therapy group
arm_group.description: tegoprazan based bismuth quadruple therapy group

arm_group.arm_group_label: PPI based bismuth quadruple therapy group
arm_group.description: PPI based bismuth quadruple therapy group

intervention.description: oral administration of tegoprazan-based bismuth quadruple therapy(tegoprazan 50 mg b.i.d, bismuth 300 mg q.i.d, metronidazole 500 mg t.i.d, tetracycline 500 mg q.i.d) for 14 days
intervention.arm_group_label: tegoprazan based bismuth quadruple therapy group

intervention.description: oral administration of PPI-based bismuth quadruple therapy(lansoprazole 30 mg b.i.d, bismuth 300 mg q.i.d, metronidazole 500 mg t.i.d, tetracycline 500 mg q.i.d) for 14 day
intervention.arm_group_label: PPI based bismuth quadruple therapy group

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
patients who male or female aged 19 to 75 years old and fall under the following conditions with confirmed helicobacter pylori infection
Exclusion Criteria:
1. patients who have H.pylori eradication history
2. patients with history of gastric cancer surgery
3. patients who have taken antibiotics within 4 weeks prior to trial
4. a person who taking HIV protease inhibitors (atazanavir, nelfinavir) or a drug containing rilpivirine
5. pregnant or breastfeeding women
